Projectiles

Class SimpleShell

  • java.lang.Object
    • Projectiles.Projectile
      • Projectiles.SimpleShell
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpiderShot

    public class SimpleShell
extends Projectile
    Class representing a basic SimpleShell type projectile. Extends the abstract Projectile class.
    Author:
    Razvan Cojocaru
